description:
Developed with EWS pros, these tires can handle everything enduro tracks throw at them. If you like a grippy tire that is built for speed, then you’ll appreciate the Wild Enduro’s Gum-X3D rubber that has incredibly high rolling efficiency.

  • GUM-X3D rubber is soft and durable, standing up to loam, dust, and rock gardens
  • Tread optimized for front or rear, so make sure you snag the right one
  • Large center blocks bite into the trail for great straight line control and power transfer
  • Directional side lugs for grip in the corners
  • Gravity Shield 3x60 TPI casing for increased puncture resistance without sacrificing ride comfort
  • Tubeless ready
name: Michelin Wild Enduro Gum-X 27.5x2.4 Tire
